name: Quick Game Cincos
description:
"Cincos"  It is a Guatemalan word used to refer to marbles.

Is a traditional game that has been played in Guatemala. There are lots of different ways to play the game. This video game is based on the type called Triangle.

Description:

It is one of the most popular, it consists of drawing a triangle on the ground and placing the marbles inside. The goal is for each player, in turn, to draw as many marbles as possible from the triangle.

The player with the most marbles at the end of the game is the winner.

You will lose the game when your marble lands inside the triangle.
